name: The Scary Killer's Basement
description:
The scary killer has kidnapped you and you need to escape!!!!! go through all 2 chapters trying to not die

[WARNING: The mobile version may be laggy for some, also the scary killers model sometimes doesn't even show up on mobile for some reason]

this game is a parody of those crappy horror games you find on the app store, although this probably has more effort in them lol
